titles.title: Lift that Name high! That glorious Name

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift that Name high! To that high tower We flee in every trial hour, Safe, sheltered, satisfied and free, For Jesus’ Name is victory.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift that Name high! Until one day His mighty Name the earth shall sway, And sin and death, distress and pain Shall be no more, for Christ shall reign.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift that Name high! For every knee Shall bow to Him; Jesus shall see Fruit of His Cross, when earth shall bring Her tribute to her Lord and King.{/lang-eng}
